metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v7.19.0 - Performance Overhaul: 95% probe success (up from 25%), rich progress display, result caching, progressive synthesis, timeout preservation, graceful degradation. Cost transparency, session state, validation gates. 29 personas, 30 commands, 35 skills. Run /octo:setup.
